help: Hi! I will notify you about the beginning of the broadcasts on Youtube Gaming, Twitch, Hitbox and GoodGame!
helpGroup: Hi! I will notify you about the beginning of the broadcasts on Youtube Gaming, Twitch, Hitbox and GoodGame!
You can control me by sending these commands:
emptyServiceList: You don't have channels in watch list, yet.
enterChannelName: Enter the channel URL or name (example: welovegames):
enterService: Enter a live streaming video platform
channelDontExist: Oops! Can't find channel in watch list!
cleared: Success! The channel list has been cleared.
selectDelChannel: Select the channel that you want to delete
rateMe: ⭐️ If you like this bot, please rate us 5 stars in store:
selectDelChannelGroupNote: Note for groups: Use Reply for open bot keyboard.
enterChannelNameNote: Note for groups: Use Reply for sending channel name.
